sentences.sentence: If both parties are at fault, each party shall be commensurately liable.
sentences.translation: 如果双方都有过错。各自承担相应的责任。

sentences.sentence: Had they paid out less, capitalappreciation would, in theory, have been commensurately higher.
sentences.translation: 假如他们支付的过少，理论上，资本增值更高。

sentences.sentence: When short-term interest rates began to rise after 1947, the cost of keeping money idle rose commensurately.
sentences.translation: 当1947年之后短期利率开始上升时，持有闲置资金的成本也相应地上升。
